When this feature is turned on, the power consumption will increase and the power consumption of the mobile phone will increase. Please restart the APP after the switch is turned on or off. Bemo Switch Blood pressure test More operations Implement the basic requirement of message alerts 1.Confirm that GuiderHX is running and connected to the device 2.Confirm that GuiderHX has set up the power consumption protection 3.Confirm that GuiderHX has set up the auto starting permission 4. Confirm that GuiderHX has set up system or mobile manager whitelist protection Q: Facebook, QQ, wechat and other applications dont have message alerts? 1. Confirm that Facebook, QQ, wechat and other applications are allowed to display messages on the notification bar 2. Turn off GuiderHX notifications and reopen To restart Q:No call alert? 1. Confirm that contact/address book permissions are turned on 2. Confirm that phone permission is turned on 3. Confirm that call record permission is turned on Q: No reminder for text messages? 2. Confirm that SMS permission is turned on Acquired Not acquired

Fatigue Test Pay attention to your physical condition properly You are energetic, no fatigue, stay focused, and work very efficiently You are slightly tired and uncomfortable. You can usually listen to some of your favorite music to ease it. You may feel tired, dizzy, stiff, etc. You can look at the distant scenery or take a nap, relieve fatigue and prepare for efficient work. You may not be able to concentrate. You are very sleepy. You should pay more attention to rest, drink more water, keep yourself in a good mood, relax your body and mind, and work efficiently Test Invalid Normal fatigue Mild fatigue Moderate Fatigue Severe Fatigue Respiratory rate Blood Oxygen Test Calibration progress Blood Oxygen Countdown Style setting of main interfaces Default style Style 1 Style 2 Style 3 Style 4 Normal Quiet Unnormal Mild Restlessness Hyperactivity More Collapse Cardiac Load Hypoxia time Sleeping Activity Severe Moderate Analysis results (for reference only) Main indicators Range of sleeping activity OSAHS HRV Hypoxia and arousal Average Value Heart health index Blood oxygen/Apnea Name Frequently appearing time Times Reference Value Max(Min) Intervention Real-time blood oxygen Apnea Lorentz scatter plot reference HRV data Mild fatigue General fatigue Severe fatigue Apnea common sense Max Min Minute Second Time area Accumulative value

If you open the message, or you can\'t receive a message reminder, you can try to open the auxiliary function. \n If you can receive a notification message, then you can ignore its presence, or you can notify or restrict the accessibility to one. \n (this function is set up to solve the problem that some models can not receive messages and can receive messages. This feature will cause messages to be reminded and repeated.)
